Graduation

Sunwoo Lee

This story is fiction, but based on fact. It's my story after the graduation. It's all about passion, anxiety, and reality


졸업 후 맞이할 미래에 대한 기대와 열정, 막연한 불안감과 좌절, 그리고 현실적인 이야기들을 담았다.
